original: Eckerbom, Nils-Bertil Gustaf, biträdande stadsombudsman, Linköping, f. 8/4/06 i Växjö av stadskamr. John E. o. Tekla Lager’holm. G. 41 m. Ingeborg Maria Boklund. Barn: Peter f. 43, Ann Carol 45. — Studrex. 25, jur. kand. 31. E. o. not. i Söder-sysslets doms. 31-34, tf. landsfogde i Kronob. 1. 36, tf. stadsomb :man i Karlstad 37, tf. komm :borgmäst. i Ludvika 38, bitr. stadsomb :man i Linköp. sed. 38. Ordf. i hyresndn i Linköp. sed. 42.
translated: Eckerbom, Nils-Bertil Gustaf, Deputy City Attorney, Linköping, born on April 8, 1906 in Växjö to journalist John E. and Tekla Lager’holm. Married in 1941 to Ingeborg Maria Boklund and they had two children, Peter born in 1943 and Ann Carol born in 1945. He studied at Studrex and obtained a law degree in 1931. He worked as a junior clerk at Söder-sysslets doms from 1931-1934, as an acting district judge in Kronob. in 1936, as an acting city attorney in Karlstad in 1937, as an acting mayor in Ludvika in 1938, and as a Deputy City Attorney in Linköping from 1938 onwards. He was also the Chairman of the Tenancy Commission in Linköping from 1942 onwards.
